name: BeatDown (itch) (Vin Botthin)
description:
Controls on Controller:

Confirm/Kick - Down Button
Back - Right Button
Pause - Up Button
Hold Direction with Left Stick

What is BeatDown?

BeatDown is a competitive fighter with local multiplayer. Everything is on beat! Move by pressing the Kick button and holding a direction on beat. The weapons shoot automatically on beat. Play with your friends and be the last one standing.

For more info, check out the Game Manual. (Ignore the white border pls. I couldn't get it to export correctly T-T)
